thread.title: Umpqua Community College shooter identified as 26-year-old man, reports say
thread.title_full: Umpqua Community College shooter identified as 26-year-old man, reports say | OregonLive.com

author: The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Umpqua Community College shooter identified as 26-year-old man, reports say
text:
The Oregonian/OregonLive has confirmed that 26-year-old Chris Harper-Mercer is the gunman who died after opening fire at Umpqua Community College and getting into a shootout with police in Roseburg on Thursday.
One neighbor said a picture of the suspected gunman being circulated on social media looked like a resident of the complex, but he didn't know the man personally.
Oregon Gov. Kate Brown said during an afternoon news conference that the shooter is a 20-year-old man. The Douglas County Sheriff's Office says the suspect killed nine people and wounded another seven on the Roseburg college campus.
Authorities have not yet confirmed the identity of the shooter or the victim. The college plans to remain closed until Monday as an investigation continues.
-- The Oregonian
